content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2023 Australian Open Packages

Our 2023 Australian Open luxury travel packages are custom-crafted to allow you to experience this incredible tournament exactly the way you want to. We’ll help you design your ideal itinerary with first class hotels including the Park Hyatt Melbourne, your choice of tournament tickets and sessions, and more. You choose how long you want to spend in Melbourne and which matches you want to see and we’ll take care of all the details to ensure a seamless experience. Complete 2023 Australian Open Packages (2-night, 2-session) are available now from $2,165; five-night semi-finals and finals packages are available from $9,975 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2023 Australian Open

The 2023 Australian Open will mark the 111th edition of the tournament. Always a top-notch tennis event, the 2023 Australian Open will take place January 16-29 in Melbourne and is sure to be one of the highlights of the season.

The Australian Open is the perfect way to start off the year: sitting under the warm Australian summer sun and watching the world’s elite tennis players doing what they do best. This popular tournament boasts more than just world-class tennis; the host city is a highlight in itself. One of the most attractive destinations on the continent, Melbourne is rich in culture, unique architecture, and great restaurants, making it a hot destination for savvy travelers.
